name.ja: <ruby>百鬼羅刹<rt>ゴブリンライダー</rt></ruby><ruby>大<rt>だい</rt></ruby><ruby>危機<rt>ピンチ</rt></ruby>

text.en: You can target 1 "Goblin" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls, OR 1 "Goblin" monster in your GY and 1 monster in your opponent's GY; banish both. You can send this face-up card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY, then target 5 of your banished "Goblin" monsters with different names; Special Summon them. You can only use 1 "Goblin Biker Grand Crisis" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
